channel.title: Data Science on Data Lab Tech TV
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Data Lab Tech TV

item.title: Economic Competition Networks
item.description: Let's reproduce the approach that predicts Survivor winners and apply it to Economic Competition Networks to better understand world trade and economic leaders

item.title: GraphRAG with KùzuDB
item.description: Let's delve into GraphRAG, learning about KùzuDB, node embeddings vs text embeddings, and LangChain, running on top of Ollama with phi4 and gemma3.
